verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: thought] [ARG1: my french friend strict breastfeeding schedule was unbelievably cruel when one woman noticed the differences between how the french feed their children compared to american parents she decided to take her friend breastfeeding philosophy and apply it to her own food habits with her kids thomas margot resignedly anouk france claire karen le billon véronique sophie]
